message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I can't pay more than $85.
I can see you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate the offer, but I can only pay $87.
I can see you're still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, but I can only afford to pay $89.
I'm still confident that we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to meet you at $98, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I value your product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $93.
I think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $100, which is my absolute minimum. If you're interested, let's finalize the sale at this price.
